channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Coup de frais pour les consoles portables Windows : le mode plein écran Xbox arrive pour tout le monde
item.description: La gamme ROG Xbox Ally ne sera pas la seule à profiter de la nouvelle « expérience plein écran » de Xbox. Depuis aujourd'hui, Microsoft la met à disposition de toutes les consoles portables sous Windows.

item.title: The music industry is all in on AI
item.description: Two years ago, “BBL Drizzy” was the AI music shot heard around the world: a song with vocals that sounded like Drake bubbled up from nowhere and launched what was shaping up to be a battle of artistry, likeness, and of course, copyright. The big three labels — Universal Music Group (UMG), Sony Music Entertainment, […]

item.title: Salesforce says some of its customers’ data was accessed after Gainsight breach
item.description: Salesforce said it’s investigating an incident where hackers compromised some of its customers' data after breaching customer experience company Gainsight.

item.title: ChatGPT launches group chats globally
item.description: The company sees group chats in ChatGPT as a way for people to coordinate trips, co-write documents, settle debates, or work through research together, while ChatGPT helps search, summarize, and compare options.

item.title: My favorite iPad deal is back for Black Friday – get the iPad Mini for just $399
item.description: I'm back once again asking you to grab this excellent iPad mini deal in Amazon's Black Friday sale.

item.title: Grok Says Elon Musk Is Smarter Than Einstein and More Fit Than LeBron James
item.description: While Musk wants you to trust Grok to organize all of human civilization's knowledge, the bot's fealty to Dear Leader is out of control.

item.title: Théia : l’ancêtre de la Lune serait née près du Soleil !
item.description: Née d’une collision cataclysmique entre la Terre et une planète aujourd’hui disparue, la Lune garde en elle la trace de cette rencontre fondatrice. Mais d’où venait réellement Théia, cet impacteur fantôme ? Une nouvelle analyse isotopique des roches terrestres et lunaires relance l’enquête :...

item.title: How the Mask Made Adam Driver Take on Kylo Ren (Exclusive)
item.description: 10 years after the 'Star Wars' sequel trilogy began in 'The Force Awakens', Adam Driver looks back in a special excerpt from a special anniversary issue of 'Star Wars Insider'.

item.title: We Finally Know the Birthplace of the Mars-Sized Rock That Spawned Our Moon
item.description: Earth and the planetary object that gave rise to the Moon were likely born in the same region of the solar system.

item.title: T-Mobile's Black Friday iPhone 17 deal gets you four devices for free, but I'd buy this one deal instead
item.description: What's better than four free iPhone 17 for Black Friday? Well, T-Mobile may have a slightly better Black Friday deal for you.

item.title: 5 fun ways to use ChatGPT from quizzes to an AI-powered DJ
item.description: Whenever you need a source of entertainment, ChatGPT can create quizzes, personalised crosswords, text-based games, and more

item.title: FICO and Plaid launch a new credit score powered by real-time cash-flow data
item.description: The updated UltraFICO Score blends traditional credit information with Plaid’s transaction-level data from 12,000+ institutions to give lenders a fuller financial picture. For consumers heavy on savings and light on credit history, a new partnership in the world of credit scores could help you lock down a loan. FICO, the company basically synonymous with the credit score, is teaming up with Plaid to bring real-time data showing how much cash you have on hand to lenders....

item.title: Why these founders ditched social ads for Taylor Swift concerts and prison tablets
item.description: Two founders share their stories on how they approached two very different markets: teens in need of well-being advice, and formerly incarcerated individuals looking for work.

item.title: Mixup is a new, Mad Libs-style app for creating AI images from photos, text and doodles
item.description: The new app lets anyone use Google's Nano Banana in a fun new way, with fill-in-the-blank AI "recipes."

item.title: Windows handhelds are getting the new Xbox Full Screen Experience tomorrow
item.description: Microsoft will start rolling out its new Xbox Full Screen Experience (FSE) to Windows-based handhelds on November 21st. The full screen mode for the Xbox app originally shipped on the Xbox Ally devices last month, providing a more console-like navigation experience on top of Windows 11. While Microsoft released a preview to MSI Claw models […]

item.title: Black Friday 2025 boycotts: ‘Mass Blackout’ and ‘We Ain’t Buying It’ protests will target Trump and billionaires. Here’s what to know
item.description: Grassroots movements are urging Americans to refuse to shop or even work this Thanksgiving, to send a message about the widening wealth gap. In our consumer driven culture, when the cost of goods is soaring, one of the most radical things you can do is not to buy anything over Black Friday. That’s the message from “Mass Blackout,” a coalition of grassroots groups that are protesting the Trump administration’s policies and urging you not to participate in this year’s extended Black Friday sales....

item.title: The future of cola? Pepsi unveils prebiotic version with only 30 calories and no artificial sweeteners
item.description: A limited early release arrives online November 28 across Amazon, Walmart, TikTok Shop, and select delivery apps. Earlier this year Pepsi purchased probiotic drinker maker Poppi, and now the soda giant is introducing a new prebiotic cola drink in its quest to capture Gen Z drinkers: Pepsi Prebiotic Cola.

item.title: Perplexity's Comet AI browser may have some concerning security flaws which could let hacker hijack your device
item.description: SquareX says it found a 'hidden API' in the Comet browser, capable of executing local commands.

item.title: Apple just revealed its Black Friday sale – but these MacBook, iPad, and AirPod deals elsewhere are better
item.description: You'll get a gift card with purchase at Apple or instant discounts elsewhere

item.title: Twitch introduces facial age scans in the UK despite privacy concerns
item.description: Twitch now requires UK users to complete a facial age scan to access mature content. This raises privacy concerns and triggers another surge in VPN interest.

item.title: Real estate investors are increasingly turning to the invisible housing market to find deals
item.description: Among single-family real estate investors, 21% say they first look to off-market deal sources—what many call the ‘invisible housing market.’ Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: Elon Musk’s Company Town Just Voted to Hand SpaceX a $7.5 Million Tax Refund
item.description: SpaceX is looking to use the tax break to build infrastructure for its Starship rocket.

item.title: The Oura Ring 4 has dropped to its lowest price yet for Black Friday
item.description: The Oura Ring 4 is our favorite smart ring thanks to its slim design, improved battery life, and in-depth health tracking features. If you’re curious to see why it’s such a great alternative to a smartwatch, you can snag the health tracker for as low as $249 at Amazon, Walmart, and Best Buy. Discounts on […]

item.title: This Lightweight Laptop Is Almost Half Off
item.description: Best Buy has the Asus Zenbook A14 marked down to almost half its sticker price.

item.title: Logitech G Pro X Superlight 2 SE : une arme e-sport redoutable avec 40 % de remise à l’occasion de la Black Friday Week
item.description: Pour la Black Friday Week, Amazon gâte les gamers avec cette réduction sur la Logitech G PRo X Superlight 2 SE qui passe de 129,99 euros à 79,99 euros.

item.title: Massive Black Friday sale just started at Amazon UK – I've found the 56 best deals from £15
item.description: This year's Black Friday sale at Amazon UK is now underway, so I've searched through all of the offers to bring you the best deals on appliances, TVs, laptops, headphones, and more.

item.description: Get the latest Black Friday deals on Apple products, vacuums, headphones, power stations, and Legos. Save $250 on a new Apple laptop and 27% on a new Kindle.

item.description: The company says the new feature will allow users to quickly share their photos, videos, and files with without worrying about the kind of phone the other person uses.

item.title: Garmin Vivoactive 6 review: A feature-stuffed pocket rocket
item.description: The Garmin Vivoactive 6 packs tons of features into a small, affordable package.

item.description: The violet Microsoft Surface Laptop 13-inch is my favorite laptop of the year, and it's now $200 off ahead of Black Friday.

item.description: Meryl Streep and many others join the voice cast of Pixar's next film, out on March 6, 2026.

item.title: Perplexity brings its Comet browser to Android
item.description: Perplexity is launching its AI-powered browser on Android. The new Comet app is available to download now, and it comes with many of the same features as the desktop version of the browser, including the ability to summon Perplexity’s built-in AI assistant while you surf the web. It’s one of the first major AI-centric browsers […]

item.title: The marketing guru who helped turn Khosla Ventures into an AI powerhouse is moving on
item.description: Daver is full of lessons for founders. Among them: "You have to repeat yourself all the time, and you have to say the same thing."

item.title: iOS 26.2 will remove one feature in parts of the world
item.description: Apple Watches and iPhones won't be able to share WiFi data with each other in Europe like they do in other places.

item.title: My favorite earbuds of 2025 are down to their lowest ever price for Black Friday
item.description: My favorite open earbuds are down to their cheapest ever price right now, and my fiancée’s are too.

item.title: Révolution dans le partage de fichiers : Google rend AirDrop compatible Android !
item.description: Partager facilement et rapidement des documents ou des photos entre un iPhone et un smartphone Android, ça a toujours été compliqué, et ça le reste encore aujourd'hui. Alors certes, on peut toujours envoyer un fichier par email ou via une messagerie, mais ça manque toujours d'instantanéité. Google fait sensation aujourd'hui en annonçant le support d'AirDrop dans Quick Share !...

item.description: Qilin leaks gigabytes of data apparently pulled from IGT servers.

item.title: Microsoft says Copilot will 'finish your code before you finish your coffee' provoking another barrage of anti-AI and Windows 11 sentiment
item.description: Microsoft flexes about Copilot's coding skills and Windows 11 users respond with merciless trolling.

item.description: Famed AI researcher Andrej Karpathy got early access to Google’s latest AI model and stumbled onto its "model smell."

item.title: YouTube tests an in-app private messaging feature again
item.description: YouTube users who are 18 and older in Ireland and Poland can now share videos directly on the mobile app.

item.description: Lego Star Wars sets on sale include the "A New Hope" edition Millenium Falcon and the retiring Desert Skiff & Sarlacc Pit.

item.title: Amazon is using AI to create video recaps of its biggest streaming shows
item.description: Amazon Prime Video is testing another new generative AI-powered feature to help catch you up on a show you’ve been watching before starting a new season. Video Recaps uses AI to identify a show’s important plot points and create a short but “theatrical-quality” summary video that combines a selection of clips with music, dialogue, and […]

item.title: Google cracked Apple’s AirDrop and is adding it to Pixel phones
item.description: Google just announced some unexpected and welcome news: Pixel 10 owners can now send and receive files with Apple devices over AirDrop. And equally interestingly, the company engineered this interoperability without Apple’s involvement. Google says it works with iPhone, iPad, and macOS devices, and applies to the entire Pixel 10 series. While limited to Google’s […]...

item.title: Early Black Friday Fire tablet deals: The best discounts you can shop now
item.description: As of Nov. 20, shop early Black Friday Fire tablet deals ahead of the sales event.

item.title: U.S. employers added 119,000 jobs in September, delayed report says
item.description: The unemployment rate rose to 4.4% in September, the highest since October 2021 and up from 4.3% in August. U.S. employers added a surprisingly solid 119,000 jobs in September, the government said, issuing a key economic report that had been delayed for seven weeks by the federal government shutdown.

item.title: La Black Friday Week fait chuter de moitié le prix du Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G : un très bon smartphone milieu de gamme pour moins de 200 €
item.description: La gamme Redmi de Xiaomi, c’est un peu l’éternel outsider celui qui débarque sur le terrain des smartphones d’entrée et de milieu de gamme en bousculant tout le monde. Sorti en début d’année, le Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 5G se glisse lui aussi dans la danse de la Black Friday Week. Affiché à 399 euros lors de son lancement, il tombe aujourd’hui à 189,10 euros sur AliExpress, grâce à un généreux coupon de réduction. ...
